snippet: The crash on Saturday night that killed the 20-year-old driver Kevin Ward Jr. has shined a floodlight on the violent confrontations that sometimes mar this rural pastime.
abstract: Crash that killed driver Kevin Ward Jr by car driven by Tony Stewart on dirt track shines light on violent confrontations that sometimes result from race car driving in Upstate New York; even while enthusiasts mourn Ward, many recount 'addictive' passion they get from dangerous driving and say buzz around the oval tracks on weekend nights is nearly religious.
lead_paragraph: The crash on Saturday night that killed the 20-year-old driver Kevin Ward Jr. has shined a floodlight on the violent confrontations that sometimes mar this rural pastime.

headline.main: At Upstate Racetracks, Passion and Peril Since Go-Cart Days
headline.print_headline: At Upstate Racetracks, Passion and Peril Since Go-Cart Days

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
